nodes.text: Plexis was an astronomical object located in the Plexis system, a part of the Southern Core portion of the Core Worlds. The home offices of House Neuvalis, a chapter house of the Bounty Hunters' Guild, were located on Plexis, leading to the celestial body being considered the homeworld of the house. Plexis was listed as the Neuvalis headquarters in an entry for the house included in the Bounty Hunters Guild Handbook.

Plexis was first mentioned in the 1994 sourcebook Galaxy Guide 10: Bounty Hunters, written by Rick D. Stuart for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Plexis system, and therefore Plexis itself, in grid square L-13.
